overview: John is cheating with Kobe and using Harry as his alibi while he spends time with mistress Varyel. And as hard as Kobe tries, she can't pry him from the erotic grasp of the kinky interloper. So she screws Harry. On the copier. And hands John the prints, with her divorce papers. Hell hath no fury like an office girl scorned....
title: The Lie
